channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 30 岁及以下人群是美国最不幸福的年龄组，其幸福感下降的原因是他们对自己的生活感觉更糟糕了
item.description:
Those 30 and under are the U.S.’s least happy age group, a decline attributed to their feeling worse about their lives https://t.co/tJGFb317Z5 https://t.co/tJGFb317Z5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：各机构必须承认，Covid 封锁、学校关闭和强制措施都是错误，不会再犯。斯科特-W-阿特拉斯（Scott W. Atlas）和 @史蒂夫-汉克（steve_hanke）写道，在他们承认错误之前，美国人民应该继续保持对他们的信任。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Institutions must acknowledge that Covid lockdowns, school closings and mandates were errors that won’t be repeated. Until they do, the American people should continue to withhold their trust, write Scott W. Atlas and @steve_hanke. https://t.co/OHKdWByF9a

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 捷蓝航空将退出某些城市并终止部分航线，以便在飞机数量有限的情况下，优先选择业绩更好的航线
item.description:
JetBlue is exiting certain cities and ending some flight routes in a bid to prioritize better-performing routes with limited aircraft on hand https://t.co/GuuMYYL6OF https://t.co/GuuMYYL6OF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一个多世纪以来，社会一直认为反社会病症是不可治疗和不可救赎的。经过多年的研究和治疗，我可以说反社会者并不 "坏"、"邪恶 "或 "疯狂"。我们的行为是为了填补空虚，帕特里克-加涅写道。
item.description:
For more than a century, society has deemed sociopathy untreatable and unredeemable. After years of study and therapy, I can say that sociopaths aren’t “bad” or “evil” or “crazy.” We act out to fill a void, writes Patric Gagne. https://t.co/PzMwXfVQp1 https://t.co/PzMwXfVQp1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@wjmcgurn 写道：一位 81 岁的天主教总统已经摒弃了他作为参议员时曾投票支持的对堕胎的所有限制，以满足堕胎游说团体的要求--但这仍然不够
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: An 81-year-old Catholic president has repudiated every limit on abortion he once voted for as a senator to do the abortion lobby’s bidding—and it still isn’t enough, writes @wjmcgurn https://t.co/kSbCA37Vcl https://t.co/kSbCA37Vcl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 回顾："这部由克里斯汀-韦格（Kristen Wiig）、艾莉森-珍妮（Allison Janney）和卡罗尔-伯内特（Carol Burnett）主演的 Apple TV+ 剧集讲述了一位女性在 1969 年前后为融入佛罗里达州棕榈滩上流社会所做的努力。
item.description:
Review: "Palm Royale," an Apple TV+ series with Kristen Wiig, Allison Janney and Carol Burnett, follows one woman’s efforts to insinuate herself into the high society of Palm Beach, Fla., circa 1969 https://t.co/MlKL1NTO9l https://t.co/MlKL1NTO9l

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：西方大国必须防止巴尔干地区进一步动荡。@ivanastradner和@MarkCMontgomery写道：北约应重新聚焦那里的军事和外交资源，并加强在科索沃的军事承诺。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Western powers must prevent further instability in the Balkans. NATO should refocus military and diplomatic resources there and reinforce military commitments in Kosovo, write @ivanastradner and @MarkCMontgomery. https://t.co/LgqXVMXlrE https://t.co/LgqXVMXlrE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最近，一位 TikToker 因其前夫违背承诺的故事而走红网络。现在，BMW 也因为对她做了同样的事情而被骂。
item.description:
A TikToker recently went viral for tales of what she said were her ex-husband’s broken promises. Now BMW is being called out for doing the same thing to her. https://t.co/pf1Twy0xiR https://t.co/pf1Twy0xiR

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登打着抨击以色列总理的幌子抨击以色列。这是他迎合反以色列左派的一种方式，同时又不会疏远大部分美国选民，因为这些选民会认为背叛以色列人民是不合情理的。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Biden bashes Israel under the cover of bashing its Prime Minister. This dance is his way of catering to the anti-Israel left without alienating the bulk of U.S. voters who would find it unconscionable to turn on the Israeli people. https://t.co/yXlCf3torV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 玫瑰是红的，紫罗兰是蓝的。当橘皮测试结束时，他还会爱我吗？

item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/6juKeTz5qK https://t.co/6juKeTz5qK

item.title: 古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）表示，由于销售持续放缓，预计第一季度的收入将有所下降，此前该公司曾发出利润预警。
item.description:
Gucci owner Kering said it expects a decline in revenue for its first quarter, following the company’s profit warning as sales continue to slow https://t.co/9y5lfDCdM0 https://t.co/9y5lfDCdM0

item.title: 每年这个时候，大批西方企业领袖和大牌投资者都会来到北京，向中国领导人致敬。这一次，谁来迎接他们同样将成为焦点。
item.description:
It is the time of year when throngs of Western corporate chieftains and big-name investors descend on Beijing to pay homage to China’s leadership. This time, the focus will be just as much on who is there to greet them. https://t.co/lMygVv6NIY https://t.co/lMygVv6NIY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在我们生活的世界里，吹风机和马桶都很时尚。现在，我们又有了 "地位 "花洒--承诺改善头发和皮肤的时尚配件，而且还很上镜。
item.description:
We live in a world with status blow dryers and status toilets. Now, there are status showerheads—sleek attachments that promise improved hair and skin and happen to be photogenic. https://t.co/MlWjCEHIxb https://t.co/MlWjCEHIxb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最高法院驳回了拜登政府的紧急上诉，拒绝阻止得克萨斯州实施自己的反非法移民法。该命令并非最终决定。
item.description:
The Supreme Court refused to block Texas from implementing its own law against illegal immigration, rejecting an emergency appeal from the Biden administration. The order isn’t a final decision. https://t.co/Th3mOQaEd8 https://t.co/Th3mOQaEd8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024
